std_narrative.citation:
Carl, son of Caro von Motzfeldt & Frederikke Elisabeth født Wessel, was born in about 1808 and confirmed on 10 April 1825 in Oslo Domkirke, Oslo, Norway. '''Confirmation''': "Church book from Oslo Domkirke / Vår Frelsers menighet parish 1824-1830 (0301M12)"
Confirmations: 1825-1st Søndag efter Paaske 1825 [1825-04-10]; Page: 606-607; Serial no.: 1
[https://media.digitalarkivet.no/kb20061005040311 Digitalarkivet Image] - [https://www.digitalarkivet.no/en/view/279/pk00000002723491 Digitalarkivet Record] (accessed 6 May 2021)
